title: The Good Manners
overview: In a Valencian village, during the postwar period, Ana tries to get ahead with her family; the civil war has opened a deep wound in all of them, especially in her brother-in-law, Antonio. Ana tries to heal that wound with stews, secrets and silences, but when Isabel, newly married to Antonio, comes to the family, Anaâ€™s attention and care will be worth little or nothing: the sacrifice does not always have its reward.
